data.title: When does 'It Ends With Us' premiere in theaters? What to know ahead of the release
data.text:
One of the most anticipated movies of the summer is premiering on Friday. If you read Colleen Hoover's book "It Ends With Us," you are probably eagerly waiting to sit in a movie theater and see its movie adaptation.

In 2023, Hoover shared news of the movie adaptation's cast on TikTok, calling Blake Lively her "dream Lily" and saying that she and Justin Baldoni "have what it takes to bring these characters to life." She also described the film's script as "amazing," adding, "I know y'all are going to be happy."

Speaking to NBC’s "The TODAY Show" in 2023, Hoover said it's "bittersweet" that "It Ends with Us" had remained on the New York Times' best-seller list for so long because its themes of domestic abuse resonate with so many people.

"It's been very heartwarming to read how much the book has helped people, and that my mother's story has actually given strength to other women to be able to leave their situations," she said during the interview. "It's a wonderful thing that I’m excited to see on the screen. I also hope that it has the same effect that the book has had."

Here's what to know about "It Ends With Us" movie release:

When does 'It Ends With Us' premiere?

"It Ends With Us" will premiere on Friday, Aug. 9.

What is 'It Ends With Us' about?

The story follows Lily Bloom (Lively), a woman who falls for neurosurgeon Ryle Kincaid (Baldoni).

"As the two fall deeply in love, Lily begins to see sides of Ryle that remind her of her parents' relationship," the studio's plot synopsis explains. "When Lily's first love, Atlas Corrigan (Brandon Sklenar), suddenly reenters her life, her relationship with Ryle is upended, and Lily realizes she must learn to rely on her own strength to make an impossible choice for her future."

Who stars in 'It Ends With Us'?

Blake Lively — "Gossip Girl" and "A Simple Favor"

Justin Baldoni — "Jane the Virgin"

Jenny Slate — "Zootopia" and "The Secret Life of Pets"

Brandon Sklenar — "The Offer" and "Vice"

Hasan Minhaj — "The Daily Show"

Kevin McKidd — "Grey's Anatomy"

Is 'It Ends With Us' based on a book?

Yes. The film is an adaptation of a book of the same name.

"It Ends with Us" sold more than 4 million copies as of 2022, though it has received criticism from some who argue the book romanticizes abuse. A sequel, "It Starts with Us," was published in 2022 and sold over 800,000 copies on its first day.

Who wrote 'It Ends With Us'?

The book "It Ends With Us" was written by Colleen Hoover.

'It Ends With Us' movie tickets

Cinemark

Cinemark is having an Early Access Screening on Wednesday.

Audiences can buy tickets ahead of the release.

AMC Theaters

On Wednesday, audiences can watch the movie ahead of its release.

Here is the link to get tickets ahead of the release.
